title: Review suitable suppliers
instruction1: The suppliers listed on this page are in order of most suitable, based on the criteria you have entered.
instruction2: Position 1 and 2 are the suppliers that best meet your criteria. Any suppliers listed in position 3 do not meet the criteria as well as the suppliers at position 1 and 2 but could still offer the services you need.
instruction3: Position 3 suppliers have not scored as highly as position 1 and 2 suppliers, but could still be considered for the opportunity, based on how they match to some of your criteria.
instruction4: If the number of suppliers in position 1 and 2 don't match the number of suppliers you chose to take forward, you can add suppliers from position 3.You will need to add a reason for the specific suppliers you choose.
instruction5: To look at the details for each supplier, go to
instruction6: You can download this list of suppliers at the bottom of the page
p1: You chose to take forward X suppliers to further competition.
p5: The X suppliers below, in position 1 and Z, will be automatically taken forward to further competition if you choose that option on the next step.
p2: You have Z suppliers with a lower score that can also be taken through to further competition.
p6: You will need to enter a reason for any suppliers you choose in the box below.
p7: You need to select at least X supplier(s).
p3: Enter the reason why you selected the suppliers from position 3 above.

backJump.title: Return to write and publish your requirements
